companyInfo.name: Sichuan New Shi Long Technology Co., Ltd.
companyInfo.nameEn: Sichuan New Shi Long Technology Co., Ltd.
companyInfo.slogan: Natural Excellence, Redefined by Integrity & Technology
companyInfo.sloganEn: Natural Excellence, Redefined by Integrity & Technology
companyInfo.address: No. 1003, 10th Floor, Unit 2, Building 7, No. 399 West Fucheng Avenue, China (Sichuan) Pilot Free Trade Zone, Chengdu Hi-Tech Zone

intro: Sichuan New Shi Long Technology Co., Ltd. is an innovative agricultural product trading company based in Chengdu and serving the global market. We specialize in promoting high-quality Chinese specialty agricultural products, particularly Morel Mushrooms known as "natural luxury goods", to the international market.

We deeply understand that in global trade, trust is the only passport. Therefore, from the very beginning, we have established "Integrity and Quality" as our highest principle, building a strict three-stage quality control system and complete international certification system (SC, HACCP, ISO 22000), ensuring that every product 100% fulfills our promise of quality and safety.

As a "technology"-driven trading company, we are developing an AI vision-based automated grading system, committed to solving the subjectivity problem of traditional agricultural product grading, upgrading industry standards from "experience judgment" to "data-driven", providing truly transparent, consistent, and quantifiable excellent products to global customers.
aboutUs.mission: Driven by technology for agricultural product standardization, through transparent quality control systems and data-based quality management, we provide 100% reliable quality products to global customers, rebuilding the foundation of trust in premium agricultural product trade.
aboutUs.vision: To become a global leading intelligent agricultural product supplier, leading industry standard innovation with technology, showcasing the beautiful achievements of China's rural revitalization to the world.

coreAdvantages.title: Certified Quality · Price Advantage
coreAdvantages.description: Complete SC, HACCP and ISO 22000 international certification system ensures every step from source to processing meets international food safety standards. Through efficient supply chain direct procurement and strict cost control, we provide extremely competitive profit margins while ensuring excellent quality.

coreAdvantages.title: Absolute Risk Control · Stable Supply
coreAdvantages.description: 50 tons annual production capacity ensures stable supply. Each batch of goods comes with detailed pre-shipment inspection reports, supporting flexible international trade terms (FOB/CIF) and negotiated payment methods, minimizing your procurement risk and ensuring peace of mind for every transaction.

coreAdvantages.title: Three-Stage QC · 100% Transparent
coreAdvantages.description: Original three-stage inspection system: Farm source screening → Processing workshop precision grading → Pre-shipment AQL sampling. Each link has strict quality control and traceable records, achieving full-process quality management from farm to delivery, ensuring products 100% meet promised standards.

coreAdvantages.title: AI-Driven · Technology Innovation
coreAdvantages.description: The Morchella-AI automated vision grading system under development will transform subjective descriptions in the NY/T 4344-2023 national standard into objective, quantifiable data indicators. Through 3D scanning, image recognition, and color spectrum analysis, we achieve pixel-level precise grading, leading the industry from experience judgment to data-driven.

focusAreas.name: Quality Management
focusAreas.description: Three-stage quality control system covering farm, processing, and shipment, ensuring 100% product quality.

focusAreas.name: International Certification
focusAreas.description: Complete certification system of SC, HACCP, ISO 22000, meeting international food safety standards.

focusAreas.name: Intelligent Grading
focusAreas.description: AI vision-based automated grading system, transforming subjective standards into objective data.

focusAreas.name: Global Trade
focusAreas.description: Proficient in FOB/CIF international trade terms, providing full customs clearance documentation and logistics support.

team.intro: The New Shi Long team consists of senior agricultural product trade experts, international certification quality management personnel, and AI technology R&D personnel. We combine traditional trade experience with modern technological innovation to provide professional, efficient, and reliable services to global customers.

leadership.name: Supply Chain Management Team
leadership.title: Source Quality Control · Direct Procurement Advantage
leadership.background: Deep cultivation in Sichuan agricultural product producing areas for many years, establishing long-term cooperative relationships with quality farms
achievements: Established supplier network covering core producing areas in Sichuan
Ensured stable supply of 50 tons annual production capacity
Implemented strict farm admission and source screening standards

leadership.name: Quality Management Team
leadership.title: International Certification · Three-Stage Quality Control
leadership.background: Professional quality inspection team with HACCP and ISO 22000 system certification management experience
achievements: Established and executed three-stage quality control system
Ensured 100% products meet international food safety standards
Provided detailed pre-shipment inspection reports for each batch

leadership.name: Export Trade Team
leadership.title: International Trade · Professional Service
leadership.background: Professional foreign trade team proficient in international trade rules and customs clearance procedures
achievements: Proficient in international trade terms such as FOB/CIF
Provided complete customs clearance documentation and logistics support
Responded to all customer needs within 2 business days

leadership.name: Technology R&D Team
leadership.title: AI R&D · Technology Innovation
leadership.background: AI R&D team with machine vision and deep learning technology background
achievements: Led Morchella-AI automated grading system development
Built morel mushroom image dataset and annotation system
Promoted industry transformation from experience judgment to data-driven

caseStudies.title: Three-Stage Quality Control System
caseStudies.subtitle: Full-Process Quality Management from Farm to Delivery
caseStudies.painPoint: Traditional agricultural product trade lacks transparent quality assurance systems, resulting in high customer procurement risks and high trust costs.

features.name: Farm Source Control
features.description: Only cooperate with quality farms meeting high standards, conducting first quality screening at picking and initial drying stages

features.name: Processing Workshop Selection
features.description: In HACCP and ISO 22000 certified environments, quality control team conducts strict manual grading according to national standards

features.name: Pre-shipment Review
features.description: Final sampling inspection using international AQL standards, issuing pre-shipment inspection reports to ensure 100% compliance with order requirements

caseStudies.outcome: Successfully established a transparent and traceable quality management system, minimizing customer procurement risks and significantly improving repurchase rates.

caseStudies.title: International Certification System
caseStudies.subtitle: SC · HACCP · ISO 22000 Triple Guarantee

features.name: SC Food Production License
features.description: Obtained the highest license for legal production and sales in the Chinese market, ensuring compliant operations

features.name: HACCP Hazard Analysis
features.description: Implemented internationally recognized food safety assurance system, identifying and controlling key safety points in production processes

features.name: ISO 22000 Management System
features.description: Following globally accepted food safety management standards, establishing comprehensive systematic management capabilities

caseStudies.outcome: Complete international certification system provides strong qualification support for product exports, winning trust from global customers.

caseStudies.title: Morchella-AI Intelligent Grading System
caseStudies.subtitle: Redefining Agricultural Product Quality Standards with AI
caseStudies.painPoint: NY/T 4344-2023 national standard execution relies on manual experience. Descriptions like "relatively symmetrical" and "minor defects" are too subjective, leading to inconsistent grading.

features.name: Form Digitization
features.description: Using 3D structured light scanning technology to accurately measure and quantify cap symmetry, integrity, and volume parameters

features.name: Defect Detection
features.description: High-resolution image recognition AI model objectively calculates defect area ratio, achieving pixel-level precise judgment

features.name: Color Standardization
features.description: Through color spectrum analysis, transforming subjective color descriptions into precise color values, ensuring 100% consistency

caseStudies.outcome: Under development, will completely eliminate subjective judgment in the future, achieving truly data-driven grading and leading industry standard innovation.

caseStudies.title: International Trade Services
caseStudies.subtitle: Professional · Efficient · Zero Risk

features.name: Flexible Trade Terms
features.description: Proficient in international trade terms such as FOB and CIF, providing optimal logistics solutions according to customer needs

features.name: Complete Documentation Support
features.description: Providing complete export customs clearance documentation including pre-shipment inspection reports, certificates of origin, health certificates, etc.

features.name: Quick Response Service
features.description: Dedicated export manager responds to inquiries within 2 business days, providing quotations, samples, and technical support

caseStudies.outcome: Established an efficient international trade service system, providing seamless procurement experience and zero-risk guarantee for global customers.
